statements: SELECT * FROM customer_churn_prediction
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_churn_prediction ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE age > 30 AND subscription_duration >= 6
SELECT customer_id, gender, last_purchase_date FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE churn_likelihood > 0.5 ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE churn_likelihood > 0.5
SELECT age, gender, subscription_duration FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customer_churn_prediction
SELECT customer_id, churn_likelihood FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE subscription_duration >= 6 AND total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT name, phone FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, join_date FROM customers WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, join_date FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '%555%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, name, email, phone, join_date FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT c.id, c.name, cp.prediction_score, cp.prediction_date FROM customers c JOIN churn_prediction cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, churn_prediction FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, churn_probability, predicted_at FROM churn_predictions ORDER BY predicted_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.customer_name, t.transaction_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, churn_probability FROM customers c JOIN churn_predictions ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id WHERE churn_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_email, churn_probability, predicted_at FROM customers c JOIN churn_predictions ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id ORDER BY predicted_at DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, avg_purchase_amount FROM churn_prediction_data WHERE churn_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 500 ORDER BY p.amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, last_purchase_date, churn_probability FROM churn_prediction_data WHERE churn_probability > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, predicted_label, predicted_date FROM predicted_churn WHERE predicted_label = true;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_city FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_churned = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_city FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_city FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_city, customer_age DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, ph.purchase_date, ph.purchase_quantity FROM products p JOIN purchase_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id WHERE ph.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY ph.purchase_quantity DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_date, c.customer_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_type FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM predictive_model WHERE model_accuracy >= 0.8 ORDER BY model_last_trained DESC LIMIT 3;
